activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7450
activity.text: @rithviknishad yes so I need to mention all the values starting from the first log update to the last log update right for example for pulse it starts from 97,94,93 so on all the way till latest 98 right... I need to wrap all these values also right in span tags?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7450

activity.text:

> 
> cc: @nihal467

@rithviknishad ohh do you mean that the sr-only tag should be applied to the whole chart again to get the chart DOM for cypress?
